dct_title_s: A new map shewing the travels of the patriarchs, as also of the children of Israel, from Egypt through the wildnerness, to the Land of Canaan
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Decorative title cartouche with an illustration of a coat of arms.
Inset map: This draught shews the severall countries or people lying most remote from the Holy Land and mentioned in the Old Testament.
Appears in Wells's A new sett of maps. London, 1722.
